arguments.name: Ref_text
arguments.description: A reference to a cell that contains an A1-style reference, an R1C1-style reference, a name defined as a reference, or a reference to a cell as a text string. If ref_text is not a valid cell reference, INDIRECT returns the #REF! error value.

arguments.name: A1
arguments.description: A logical value that specifies what type of reference is contained in the cell ref_text.
